description:
The accessories "Sunflower Headband" and "Summer Sunglasses" are added.

Note: After unlocking the Change Outfit function for the poolside "Locker Room", you can change into the accessories from the lockers inside the "Locker Room".
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".
name: Sunflower Headband & Summer Sunglasses
